metadata.title: CVE-2021-20224 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An integer overflow issue was discovered in ImageMagick'sExportIndexQuantum() function in MagickCore/quantum-export.c. Functioncalls to GetPixelIndex() could result in values outside the range ofrepresentable for the 'unsigned char'. When ImageMagick processes a craftedpdf file, this could lead to an undefined behaviour or a crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20224` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
libmagick++-6.q16-7 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-7 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
libmagickcore-6.q16-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
libmagickcore-6.q16-3-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-3-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
libmagickwand-6.q16-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
perlmagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.14').
